name: Subacute Thyroiditis with Transient Hyperthyroidism
chief_complaint: Neck pain and fatigue for the past 2 weeks, with occasional palpitations
prognosis: Generally excellent; most patients recover normal thyroid function within 12 months
description: A self-limiting inflammatory thyroid disorder characterized by thyroid pain, transient hyperthyroidism, and subsequent recovery or sometimes temporary hypothyroidism. Often follows a viral upper respiratory infection.
